text: Pope Pius VIII (; 20 November 1761 â€“ 30 November 1830), born Francesco Saverio Castiglioni was an Italian priest of the Roman Catholic Church and the 254th Pope from 1829 and 1830. "List of Popes," Catholic Encyclopedia (2009); retrieved 2011-11-02. ==Early life== He was born in Cingoli near Ancona. ==Bishop== In 1800, Pius VII named Castiglioni to be Bishop of Montalto. "Pope Pius VIII", Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2011-10-02. ==Cardinal== Pius VII made Castiglioni a cardinal in 1816. Cardinal Catiglioni was made Bishop of Frascati in 1822. ==Pope== Cardinal Castiglioni was elected Pope 1829; and his reign lasted only 20 months. ==Related pages== * List of popes ==References== == Other websites == * * Catholic Hierarchy, Pope Pius VIII * Cardinals of the Holy Roman Church , Cardinal Castiglioni Category:1761 births Category:1830 deaths Category:Italian popes Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
